languages.text: Дети Искупления — немногие выжившие, что из последних сил держат оборону против еретиков и ксеносов. Их старейшины искренне веруют, что это Император обрушил на мир свой гнев — забрал Огненную Посланницу и заполонил планету Кошмарами.

traits.locale_text: Дети Искупления — немногие выжившие, что из последних сил держат оборону против еретиков и ксеносов. Их старейшины искренее веруют, что это Император обрушил на мир свой гнев — забрал Огненную Посланницу и заполонил планету Кошмарами.

languages.text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.
languages.original_text: Дети Искупления — немногие выжившие, что из последних сил держат оборону против еретиков и ксеносов. Их старейшины искренне веруют, что это Император обрушил на мир свой гнев — забрал Огненную Посланницу и заполонил планету Кошмарами.

traits.locale_text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

languages.text: 幸存下来的人自称为“救赎之子”，他们依然在拼尽最后的力量，抵抗异端分子与异形。他们的长老真诚地相信，是帝皇将祂的怒火发泄到了这个世界上。他们认为是帝皇带走了烈焰使者，让这颗行星充满了恐怖。
languages.original_text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

traits.locale_text: 幸存下来的人自称为“救赎之子”，他们依然在拼尽最后的力量，抵抗异端分子与异形。他们的长老真诚地相信，是帝皇将祂的怒火发泄到了这个世界上。他们认为是帝皇带走了烈焰使者，让这颗行星充满了恐怖。

languages.text: チルドレン・オブ・リデンプションの生存者は少数ながら、最後の力を振り絞って異端者や異種族に立ち向かっている。長老たちは、皇帝が世界に憤怒を送り、猛火の使者を奪い、惑星を悪夢で満たしたと心から信じている。
languages.original_text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

traits.locale_text: チルドレン・オブ・リデンプションの生存者は少数ながら、最後の力を振り絞って異端者や異種族に立ち向かっている。長老たちは、皇帝が世界に憤怒を送り、猛火の使者を奪い、惑星を悪夢で満たしたと心から信じている。

languages.text: Los Hijos de la Redención son los escasos supervivientes que aún resisten contra los herejes y los xenos con las exiguas fuerzas que les quedan. Sus ancianos creen sinceramente que el Emperador ha castigado a su mundo, arrebatándoles el Mensajero Ardiente y llenando el planeta de pesadillas.
languages.original_text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

traits.locale_text: Los Hijos de la Redención son los escasos supervivientes que aún resisten contra los herejes y los xenos con las exiguas fuerzas que les quedan. Sus ancianos creen sinceramente que el Emperador ha castigado a su mundo, arrebatándoles el Mensajero Ardiente y llenando el planeta de pesadillas.

languages.text: Die Kinder der Erlösung sind eine kleine Gruppe von Überlebenden, die sich mit letzter Kraft gegen die Häretiker und Xenos stemmen. Ihre Ältesten sind fest davon überzeugt, dass der Imperator die Welt seinen Zorn spüren lässt ... da er den Feurigen Boten abgezogen hat und den Planeten mit Albträumen überzieht.
languages.original_text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

traits.locale_text: Die Kinder der Erlösung sind eine kleine Gruppe von Überlebenden, die sich mit letzter Kraft gegen die Häretiker und Xenos stemmen. Ihre Ältesten sind fest davon überzeugt, dass der Imperator die Welt seinen Zorn spüren lässt ... da er den Feurigen Boten abgezogen hat und den Planeten mit Albträumen überzieht.

languages.text: Les Enfants de la Rédemption représentent les quelques individus qui résistent encore aux hérétiques et aux xénos en puisant dans leurs dernières forces. Leurs aînés pensent sincèrement que l'Empereur a déchaîné son courroux sur ce monde, en emportant la Messagère ardente et en multipliant les Cauchemars sur la planète.
languages.original_text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

traits.locale_text: Les Enfants de la Rédemption représentent les quelques individus qui résistent encore aux hérétiques et aux xénos en puisant dans leurs dernières forces. Leurs aînés pensent sincèrement que l'Empereur a déchaîné son courroux sur ce monde, en emportant la Messagère ardente et en multipliant les Cauchemars sur la planète.

languages.text: Kefaretin Çocukları; az sayıda hayatta kalandan oluşan, var güçleriyle kâfirlere ve zenolara direnmeye çalışan bir grup. Büyükleri, dünyanın İmparator'un öfkesinin hedefi olduğuna; Ateşten Ulak'ı uzaklaştıranın ve gezegeni Kâbuslarla dolduranın O olduğuna inanıyor.
languages.original_text: The Children of Redemption are the small number of survivors still holding out against the heretics and xenos with their last vestiges of strength. Their elders sincerely believe that the Emperor has sent his wrath upon the world — taking away the Fiery Messenger and filling the planet with Nightmares.

traits.locale_text: Kefaretin Çocukları, az sayıda hayatta kalan kişiden oluşan, son kalan güçleriyle kâfirlere ve zenolara direnmeye çalışan bir grup. Büyükleri, dünyanın, İmparator'un öfkesinin hedefi olduğuna, Ateşten Ulak'ı uzaklaştıranın ve gezegeni Kâbuslarla dolduranın O olduğuna inanıyorlar.
